title: Easy Parmesan Crusted Chicken
directions: Combine Hellmann's(R) Real Mayonnaise with cheese in medium bowl. Arrange chicken on baking sheet. Evenly top with mayonnaise mixture, then sprinkle with bread crumbs.
Bake 20 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
ingredients: 4 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
